remixlab.devices
Class BezierCurve

java.lang.Object
  remixlab.devices.BezierCurve

public class BezierCurve
extends java.lang.Object

A BezierCurve is a curve like a painted by Processing function bezier().

getPoint

public processing.core.PVector getPoint(float t)
Get a PVector with a point defined by t parameter in the cubic Bezier curve

Parameters:
t: - Parameter of parametric curve
Returns:
PVector: Point where the curve takes the t-value

connect

public void connect(BezierCurve prevCurve)
Connect this BezierCurve to the previous. 1. Set initial to prevCurve.fin 2. Set the second control point of prevCurve with the first control point of this curve

Parameters:
prevCurve - is the previous BezierCurve in the tunnel with
